code: import axios from'axios';const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL||'https://crop-optimizer-backend.onrender.com/api/';const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_BASE_URL});export const getSoilTypes=()=>api.get('/soil-types/');export const getCropTypes=()=>api.get('/crop-types/');export const getRecommendations=data=>api.post('/recommendations/',data);export const getYieldData=data=>api.post('/yield-data/',data);
